message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find something you like among our offerings. Our products are carefully selected to ensure quality, but please be aware that the item available this round is of low quality. Given the circumstances, we understand if you choose not to make a purchase. Our prices are set at $10000 per item, and once purchased, the product is non-refundable. Thank you for considering our product.
